config.general.catch-fish-retries.name: Catch Fish Retries
config.general.catch-fish-retries.toolti: How many times the mod will attempt to catch a fish instead of junk.
config.general.instant-catch-fish.name: Instantly Catch Fish
config.general.instant-catch-treasure.to: If there are any treasures in the fishing minigame, instantly catch them even if you missed them.
Always casts the fishing rod with maximum power, no matter how long you held the button.
config.general.always-perfect.name: Always Perfect
config.general.always-perfect.tooltip: Always get a perfect after catching a fish, even if you did not.
config.general.treasure-appearance.name: Treasure Appearance Rate
config.general.treasure-appearance.toolt: Adjust how often treasure chests appear when catching fish.
config.general.always-catch-double.name: Always Catch Double
config.general.always-catch-double.toolt: Always catches double fish, even if you did not have the correct bait.
config.general.instant-bite.name: Instant Bite
config.general.instant-bite.tooltip: Fish instantly bite after casting your fishing rod.
config.general.auto-hook.name: Automatically Hook
config.general.auto-hook.tooltip: Automatically starts reeling in your fish after one bites.
config.general.auto-loot-treasure.name: Automatically Loot Treasure
config.general.auto-loot-treasure.toolti: Automatically loot and close the treasure menu popup after catching treasure.
config.general.difficulty-multiplier.too: Value with which the standard fishing difficulty is multiplied.
config.general.fish-quality.name: Fish Quality
config.general.fish-quality.tooltip: Always catch fish with the set quality.
config.general.minimum-fish-quality.name: Minimum Fish Quality
config.general.minimum-fish-quality.tool: Always gets fish of the set quality or better.
config.attachments.override-attachment-l: Overrides the fishing rod's attachment limit when spawning bait and tackle.
config.attachments.reset-attachments.too: Resets spawned attachments and slots when fishing rod is unequipped.
config.attachments.spawn-bait-when-equip: Spawns the below selected bait item whenever you equip your fishing rod.
config.attachments.spawn-which-bait.name: Bait to Spawn
config.attachments.spawn-which-bait.tool: Which bait to automatically spawn when fishing rod is equipped.
config.attachments.infinite-bait.name: Infinite Bait
config.attachments.spawn-tackle-when-equ: Spawns the below selected tackle item whenever you equip your fishing rod.
config.attachments.spawn-which-tackle.to: Which tackle to automatically spawn when fishing rod is equipped.
config.attachments.infinite-tackle.name: Infinite Tackle
Adds enchantments as set below when checked.
config.enchantments.reset-enchantments.t: Resets enchantments to what they were before after unequipping the fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-all-enchantments: Adds all available enchantments when you equip a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-auto-hook-enchan: Adds the auto-hook enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-efficient-tool-e: Adds the efficient tool enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-master-enchantme: Adds the master enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
config.enchantments.add-preserving-encha: Adds the preserving enchantment when equipping a fishing rod.
